title: Chainlist Skills
description: Access blockchain RPC endpoints and network information from chainlist.org. Enable this skill to look up EVM-compatible networks by name, symbol, or chain ID and get their RPC endpoints, native currencies, and explorer links.

chain_lookup.title: Chain Lookup
chain_lookup.description: Enables looking up blockchain RPC endpoints and network information. When public, available to all users; when private, only to authenticated users.

states.description: Configure visibility for chainlist skills (disabled: unavailable, public: available to all, private: available only to authenticated users)
